channel.description: Recent content in paradox on MG Blog

item.title: Most popular Temporal Paradoxes
item.description: A temporal paradox, time paradox, or time travel paradox is an apparent contradiction, or logical contradiction associated with the idea of time and time travel. Causal Loop The causal loop is a paradox in which a future event causes the past event which leads to the future event. For example a billiard ball moves to a time travel machine and travels to its past and strikes the past self towards the time machine.
